titleStmt.title: The blessedness of departed saints in their immediate enjoyment of God in glorie Propounded and improved in a funeral-sermon, upon Revel. 14.13. March 3. 1651. By Joseph Rowe, minister of the Gospel, and pastor of Buckland-monachorum in Devon.
titleStmt.author: Rowe, Joseph, b. 1617 or 18.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by W. Bentley, for F. Eaglesfield at the Marygold in S. Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original at the British Library.
